articles.title: S. Korean Resident Defects to DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Resident Defects to DPRK
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kang Tong Rim, 30, who resided in Polgyo Township, Posong County, South Jolla Province of south Korea, Monday came over to the northern half of Korea by crossing the Military Demarcation Line in the eastern sector of the front.
					According to him, he served in the First Platoon of the 9th Company under the 3rd Battalion of the 56th Regiment, the 22nd Division of the south Korean army, from September 2001 to November 2003. During the military service he made several attempts for defection with his longing for the northern half of Korea, but in vain.
					
					After being discharged he worked at the Samsung Semiconductor Company as a worker and then left it. He was employed at a pig farm in Polgyo Township before defection.
					
					He is pleased with the accomplishment of his desire for defection.
					
					He is now under the warm care of a relevant organ.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Czech President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Czech President
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Vaclav Klaus, President of the Czech Republic, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished progress and prosperity to the Czech people.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets Czech PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets Czech PM
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Jan Fischer, Prime Minister of the Czech Republic, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would develop in mutual interests of their peoples.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of its Central Committee, left here Tuesday to visit China.

articles.title: Mongolian Delegation and Japanese Group Here
articles.content:
Mongolian Delegation and Japanese Group Here
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Mongolian Democratic Women's Union led by Vice-President S. Battsetseg  and a group of Japanese local assemblymen demanding the promotion of Japan-Korea friendship led by Seizaburo Eguchi, representative of the Tokyo Ward Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship, arrived here Tuesday by air to visit the DPRK.

articles.title: Senior Officials Enjoy Art Performance
articles.content:
Senior Officials Enjoy Art Performance
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by servicepersons of companies of the Korean People's Army, who participated in the 33rd art festival of KPA servicepersons, at the Mansudae Art Theatre on Monday. 
					 It was appreciated by senior party, army and state officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties and officials of ministries and national institutions. 
					
					 The performers put on the stage chorus "Sentinels on the Defence Line a Thousand-ri Away Offer Morning Salute to the Supreme Commander," male trio "We Are Soldiers at the Outpost," female solo "Arirang of Chol Pass", a poem reciting and story-telling "'Tempting Trend ' and Arms Given by the Working Class'', chorus "The Army of Mt. Paektu Will Reply" and other colorful numbers. 
					
					 They enthusiastically sang of the greatness of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has trained the KPA  into an invincible army and truthfully represented their worthwhile military service and optimistic life under his care.

articles.title: 1.64 Million People Visited Tangun's Mausoleum
articles.content:
1.64 Million People Visited Tangun's Mausoleum
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of people are visiting King Tangun's Mausoleum in Kangdong County of Pyongyang.
					President Kim Il Sung saw to it that Tangun, founding father of the Korean nation who had been known to be a mere myth for a long period of time, was found out. He personally chose the site for the mausoleum on the spot and examined the final lay-out for the mausoleum in the last period of his great life.
					
					Under the deep care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il the mausoleum was successfully reconstructed in less than a year.
					
					There are at the mausoleum the Monument to the Reconstructed Mausoleum of King Tangun, sculptures of his sons and subjects, stone sculptures of Korean tigers, four dagger pagodas describing Pipha-shaped dagger, a symbolic weapon of Ancient Korea, the main chamber and others.
					
					At least 1.64 million people from all walks of life and school youth and children, personages of all circles in south Korea, overseas Koreans and foreign guests have visited the mausoleum over the last 15 years since it was reconstructed.

articles.title: Univ. Students Render Services to Activating Production
articles.content:
Univ. Students Render Services to Activating Production
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Students of the DPRK are actively taking part in scientific research on working sites.
					The members of the student scientific research team of Kim Chaek University of Technology achieved remarkable successes in raising the capability of a direct current contactor for crane needed for putting the production of the UHP electric arc furnace on normal track and in developing an automatic temperature and humidity adjusting device for hatching duck eggs which makes it possible to boost the actual hatching rate two to three times that of the preceding one.
					
					Successes have been reported from those dispatched to the Chollima Steel Complex, the Pyongyang Steel Works and other industrial establishments.
					
					The members of the student scientific research team of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering developed a 3-D design and imitation programme for flexible shuttle-free loom and applied them to production, thus opening a vista for increasing the scientific accuracy of texture.
					
					Students of Pyongyang University of Computer Science went to the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex where they made a progress in the development of an image monitoring system for observing electricity production.
					
					Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry has completed many designs necessary for general foodstuff processing factories now under construction in provinces in a short span of time and is giving scientific and technological assistance to their production of facilities on the spot.
					
					The members of the student scientific research team of Pyongyang University of Construction and Building-Materials Industry have creditably completed the designs of objects for the construction of the Pyongyang Minsok (folk) Park with patriotic feelings to shine the fine history of the nation, thus ensuring the construction tempo.
					
					Similar activities are being made by students of Pyongyang University of Railways, Pyongyang University of Agriculture and other universities in local areas.
					
					These activities provide them with a good opportunity to acquire broader knowledge by closely combining study with practice and to strive harder for grasping latest science and technology.

articles.title: U.S. Design to Stifle DPRK by Force Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. Design to Stifle DPRK by Force Flayed
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The United States is speeding up the production of "bunker-buster" and its deployment for action on a full scale in a bid to use it for attacking underground military objects and nuclear facilities of the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed commentary.
					The commentary goes on to say:
					
					The U.S. has not yet abandoned its design to stifle the DPRK by force but is seeking to disarm the DPRK through the camouflaged peace. Meanwhile, it is additionally deploying modern offensive means in south Korea and its surrounding area in a scenario to stifle the DPRK by means of preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					It is under this scenario that the U.S. bellicose forces have recently staged mad-cap joint military exercises with south Korea on the west sea of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. imperialists, accustomed to aggression and war, are seeking only the military confrontation and provocation of a new war on the Korean Peninsula. However, the U.S. is making a strategic mistake as it puts too much confidence in its strength.
					
					It is ridiculous and futile for the U.S. to frighten the army and the people of the DPRK with "superiority" of military technical means such as super-large bomb and nuclear-powered carrier.
					
					The tragedy for the U.S. is its failure to have understanding of the DPRK's strength and mental power.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Bringing Nuclear Carrier for Maneuver
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Bringing Nuclear Carrier for Maneuver
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The United States brought even its nuclear-powered carrier "George Washington" to be involved in the recent joint military maneuver it staged with the south Korean military authorities in the West Sea of the Korean Peninsula. This was another grave military threat to the DPRK. Minju Joson Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					It goes on:
					
					As far as the West Sea of Korea is concerned, it is a very sensitive area where there is the danger of frequent conflict between the armed forces of the north and the south and they are standing in acute military confrontation.
					
					By introducing the above-said carrier into the waters fraught with such great danger that it is listed as a hotbed of a war, in fact, the U.S. brought to light its strategic scenario to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK in contingency and stifle it by force of arms.
					
					This bellicose action taken by the U.S. at a time when the world is working hard to find a solution to the issue of ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula is nothing but a blatant challenge to the efforts of peace-loving humankind.  
					
					The U.S. is regarding its military threat and frantic armed intervention as "the most effective and reliable option" and a mainstay of "its strategy towards the DPRK."
					
					The DPRK can never remain a passive onlooker to this dangerous development as the country's security is gravely threatened by the U.S. and the situation on the Korean Peninsula is deteriorating. 
					
					The DPRK is left with no option but to bolster up its war deterrent in every way under the present situation where the U.S. is adamantly refusing to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK for the purpose of ensuring peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the DPRK's dignity and security are exposed to a threat.
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the present situation, judge it with reason and take a right option.

articles.title: Moves to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Moves to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK Denounced in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration issued a statement on October 24 to denounce the south Korean authorities and the U.S. for their moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					The statement accused the south Korean and U.S. bellicose forces of holding the 41st "annual security consultative meeting" in Seoul recently at which they raised a hue and cry over "a nuclear threat from the north" and called for taking an adventurous "posture of military counteraction" to cope with it.  
					
					The statement said: 
					
					The warlike forces released a "joint statement" in which they underscored the need to deploy reinforced U.S. forces and strategic nuclear weapons in south Korea and establish a missile defense system under the pretext of "providing extended deterrent". This is nothing but a scenario to put military pressure upon the north, going beyond the scope of the existing "sanctions against the north," and drive the situation on the Korean Peninsula into a war crisis again.
					
					The open discussion conducted by the bellicose forces on the "provision of a nuclear umbrella" brought to light the U.S. strategy for establishing hegemony with main emphasis on nukes. 
					
					The recent "joint statement" is nothing but a document that confirmed once again that both south Korea and the U.S. are not willing to seek a peaceful solution to the nuclear issue on the peninsula and "a written pledge" to tighten the military sanctions against the north and escalate the moves for a war of aggression against it. 
					
					The south Korean authorities and the U.S. should retract at once the secret military agreement concluded at the recent meeting, well aware that the north was compelled to have access to nukes due to the U.S. moves for a war of aggression and threat of its nuclear attack to it, urged the statement.

articles.title: Mexican Committee Release Bulletin
articles.content:
Mexican Committee Release Bulletin
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism released the 31st issue of its bulletin carrying a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il conducting his revolutionary activities.
					The bulletin in an article titled "The new great revolutionary surge in the DPRK and a thriving nation" said that the all-people onward movement is now being dynamically conducted in the DPRK with the goal to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					In December 2008 Kim Jong Il visited the Chollima Steel Complex to kindle the torch of new great revolutionary surge, it noted, and said:
					
					In retrospect, President Kim Il Sung visited the workers of Kangson in December 1956 to start the Chollima movement.
					
					Today the Korean people are bringing about the same surge of leaping progress as they did at that time.
					
					They are determined to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea.
					
					Under the Songun policy of Kim Jong Il the DPRK has already turned into a political and ideological and military power.
					
					So, it can be said to be a thriving nation both in name and reality when it becomes an economic power.
					
					Kim Jong Il is at the head of the grand march of the Korean people dynamically advancing towards the goal of a thriving nation.
					
					The Korean people will in the near future win victory through the new grand revolutionary march for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Observed in Venezuela
articles.content:
Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Observed in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A Venezuelan preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated with due ceremony on Oct. 17.
					 The chairman of the Venezuela-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.
					
					 The committee decided to hold on a nationwide scale such colorful events as seminar on the Juche idea, meeting and photo exhibition until 2012.

articles.title: Elevator of Love for People
articles.content:
Elevator of Love for People
Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the newly built Pothonggang Shop one August day this year.
					After making round of the counters on the first and second floors, he stopped walking on the first floor and asked officials whether there was an elevator in the shop.
					
					Hearing the reply of an official that it was not envisaged in the design as it was a two-storied building, he said: It may be difficult for the aged to go up to the second floor on foot. It will not be a matter for the young people, but will be inconvenient for the aged and women to go up and down the stairs, carrying goods with them.
					
					He admonished the officials that whatever they may do, they should perfectly promote convenience of the people, not any slightest inconvenience.
					
					As seen above, he thinks first of the convenience of the people who will use it. Thanks to his noble outlook on the people, an elevator was installed at the shop before its opening to the public.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del 33o festival artistico de militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del 33o festival artistico de militares 
Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion de los militares de las companias adscritas a las Unidades No. 567, No. 531, No. 762 y No. 630 del EPC quienes participan en el 33o Festival Artistico de Militares del EPC.
					Los militares llevaron a la escena el coro "Rinden el saludo matutino los soldados en el lejano frente", la poesia en dialogo "Aroma de amor que inunda el puesto", la cancion con acompanamiento de Oungum (instrumento musical de Corea) "Azul cielo de mi pais" y otras piezas de diversos generos.
					
					En este espectaculo los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la valiosa vida de los soldados que se sienten muy afortunados en el regazo afectuoso del General Kim Jong Il.
					
					Y mostraron patentemente el poderio del heroico EPC, crecido como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del monte Paektu, la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de todos los uniformados de defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion siendo bastion y escudo y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente respondio con su mano alzada a las aclamaciones entusiastas de los espectadores y ejecutantes y felicito el exito logrado por estos en la ocasion. 
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los militares de las companias hayan ofrecido esta funcion magnifica y perfecta en lo ideo-artistico con piezas de correctos temas politicos, aprecio mucho el exito alcanzado por ellos en la ocasion y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					Todos los militares nuestros se han preparado firmemente como combatientes inflexibles e infinitamente fieles al partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo y como creadores de la cultura militar de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) que tienen gran dosis de moral y vocacion cultural, dijo.
					
					Puesto que estas fuerzas armadas de flor y nata defienden como fortaleza inexpugnable la linea de defensa de la patria, es invencible el mas superior regimen socialista de nuestro pais que esta centrado en las masas populares, asevero.
					
					El 33o Festival Artistico de Militares del EPC, transcurrido con exito, demostro claramente la justeza y la vitalidad de la orientacion del partido sobre la masificacion del arte, apunto y envio su cordial saludo a todos los participantes que demostraron con vigor el poderio espiritual y colectivo del EPC tomando parte en el certamen con gran entusiasmo.
					
					Nuestra gloriosa historia revolucionaria, iniciada y avanzada con la cancion, deviene tambien el gran triunfo de la politica musical que comprobo patentemente el poderio del arte, subrayo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en desarrollar mas las actividades artisticas masivas, que constituyen uno de los importantes medios para elevar la combatividad de las unidades.
					
					Disfrutaron tambien la funcion el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional (CDN) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares; el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC; el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC; los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su; el coronel general Han Tong Gun y otros comandantes del ejercito, los secretarios Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes y primeros subjefes de departamento y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Habitante surcoreano pasa a la RPDC por causa justa
articles.content:
Habitante surcoreano pasa a la RPDC por causa justa
Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ATCC) -- Kang Tong Rim (30 anos de edad), quien vivia en la cabecera de Polgyo del distrito de Posong de la provincia de Jolla del Sur de Corea, llego el dia 26 a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por la causa justa pasando la Linea de Demarcacion Militar en la parte oriental del frente.
					El hizo servicio militar en la seccion 1 de la compania 9 del batallon 3 del regimiento 56 de la division 22 del ejercito surcoreano desde septiembre de 2001 hasta noviembre de 2003. Durante este periodo intento en varias veces pasar a la RPDC, pero no obtuvo oportunidad. 
					
					Despues de ser retirado del ejercito, trabajo de obrero en la Compania de Semiconductores de Samsong.
					
					Luego, trabajo en una fabrica de cerdos situada en la cabecera de Polgyo hasta antes de pasar al Norte de Corea.
					
					 Kang esta muy alegre por haber alcanzado su deseo.
					
					 Ahora, goza de cordial proteccion del organo correspondiente.

articles.title: Cuadros presencian funcion artistica de los militares
articles.content:
Cuadros presencian funcion artistica de los militares
Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en el Teatro de Arte Mansudae la funcion de los militares de las companias que participan en el 33o Festival Artistico de Militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					 La vieron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de partidos amigos y los funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales.
					
					Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena diversas piezas, entre otras, el coro "Rinden el saludo matutino los soldados en el lejano frente", el trio masculino "Somos soldados de la primera linea", el solo femenino "Arirang del paso Chol", la poesia y narracion "'La corriente rosada' y el fusil de clase" y el coro "El fusil del monte Paektu respondera".
					
					En el espectaculo ellos elogiaron altamente la noble personalidad del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien formo a las fuerzas armadas invencibles, y mostraron vividamente la dignidad, el orgullo y la optimista vida de si mismos que pasan valiosos dias de servicio militar en el regazo de ese genial comandante del Songun (priorizacion militar).

articles.title: Minju Joson condena la entrada de "George Washington" en Mar Oeste
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena la entrada de "George Washington" en Mar Oeste
Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos realizo junto con las autoridades militares surcoreanas el ejercicio militar conjunto en el Mar Oeste de la Peninsula Coreana movilizando hasta el portaaviones de propulsion nuclear "George Washington", lo cual deviene otra grave amenaza militar contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 27 y continua:
					
					Ambas partes de Corea se enfrentan agudamente con las fuerzas armadas en el Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					En efecto, ahi ocurren con frecuencia los conflictos armados entre ambas partes.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. envio ese portaaviones nuclear dispuesto de equipos belicos sofisticados a tal zona maritima peligrosa, conocida como foco de guerra, mostrando abiertamente su intento estrategico de atacar preventivamente a la RPDC y aplastarla por via militar en el tiempo de emergencia.
					
					 Tal actitud belicista, que toma EE.UU. justamente cuando todo el mundo se esfuerza mucho por solucionar el problema de preservacion de la paz en la Peninsula Coreana, deviene sin dudas un desafio a los esfuerzos de la humanidad por defender la paz.
					
					 EE.UU. presenta la amenaza militar y la activa intervencion militar como "opcion mas eficiente y confiable" y fundamento de su "estrategia hacia Corea".
					
					La RPDC no puede estar jamas con brazos cruzados ante esa situacion tan peligrosa en que debido a las maniobras de EE.UU., se ve gravemente amenazada la seguridad del pais y se empeora la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Dado que EE.UU. se niega obstinadamente a abstenerse de su politica hostil a la RPDC, condicion indispensable de la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, la unica opcion de la segunda sera incrementar por todos los medios sus fuerzas disuasivas de guerra.
					
					 EE.UU. debe tomar una opcion correcta justipreciando la situacion actual.
